nodes.text: The Horse's Mouth

Straight from the Horse's Mouth was a regular department in the Star Wars Insider that was written by Bob Cooper and Peet Janes. The column discussed the latest Star Wars comic books from Dark Horse Comics, covering series such as Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi and Star Wars: Republic. It began alternating with the Bookshelf department, written by Jason Fry, in Star Wars Insider 44.
Star Wars Insider 25
Bob Cooper previews forthcoming Star Wars comics for 1995–1996.
